cleaned_text: Crystal Tomato Skin Whitening Supplement 30 Tablets (COLLECT IN STORE ONLY - MAX 3 BOXES PER PAX) [](/products/crystal-tomato-skin-whitening-supplement-collect-instore-only) Crystal Tomato Skin Whitening Supplement 30 Tablets (COLLECT IN STORE ONLY - MAX 3 BOXES PER PAX) [View full details](/products/crystal-tomato-skin-whitening-supplement-collect-instore-only) Crystal Tomato® carotenoids are antioxidants that prevent the formation of free radicals and prolong the longevity of cell DNA. They protect the skin from premature ageing caused by sun exposure. In the right doses, the supplement helps the individual to produce a more even and brighter skin tone. It also helps to reduce dark spots on the face. - Improves skin quality—skin becomes smoother, with a healthier texture - Lightens and evens out skin tone - Reduces collagen degradation - Prevents premature skin ageing - Enhances biomolecules - Enhances and protects the effects of sunscreen - Promotes skin radiance and increases suppleness - Protects against Sunlight damage - Protects against environmental stress and free radicals - Prevents skin damage from oxidative stress - Inhibits dark spots on the face - Reduces skin dryness COLLECT IN STORE ONLY. NO SHIPPING. COLLECT AT : Novena Medical Center, 10 Sinaran Drive Square 2 #09-12, Singapore 307506 *Show receipt upon collection.* *MAXIMUM 3 BOX PER PERSON* We deliver using Standard and Expedited delivery within Singapore. You can also pick up your order at one of our locations. Free domestic shipping is available for orders above a particular amount.
